Bookmark.description: A Collected Resource, aka a URL with no content

catalog.description: The Catalog the resource belongs to

content_location.description: URL of the content for this resource, expectation is these are served from an object store

created.description: The date on which the entity was created.

format.description: The file format of the resource object

has_use.description: Resource is part of an ongoing effort or activity on the life business

location.description: The canonical URL of the resource in its external repository.

media_type.description: MIME type (e.g., text/markdown, video/mp4) of the resource's content

modified.description: The date on which the entity was updated.

repository.description: The repository a resource is stored in

theme.description: Resource is releated to some topic, subject, concept defined in the life business knowledge taxonomy
